reviewText: Martin takes you on a tour and discusses the history of Multiple Reel-Reel machines. It is broken down to three CD's and well indexed...so if you want to skip parts you can. If you really want a history of the Reel to Reel, this is it. If you are NOT into analog equipment, this will likely bore you as the warning suggests.  There is also an overview of several microphones in the collection. Since his museum/studio is not open to the general public, this is as close as you can get.
